Summary: i saw a black triangle flying from one part of the sky to another
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around December 31st 2004
divs: Sighting Detailsi was sitting in my car in a parking lot waiting for my son to come out of day care, my car was facing south. i was staring at the sky because there were very lite or transparent clouds covering the brightness of the sun so i was able to stare at the sun without it hurting my eyes. all of a sudden from behind some dark clouds that were to the right of me a perfectly shaped triangle was traveling from west to east, it had to be about 2 or so miles away from me very large in size, solid color no lights or markings were visible, like i said it came out from behind a large group of clouds traveled east and went behind another group of clouds. no sound was heard and it didnt make any strange movements or flight patterns , just smooth and quiet..the object was visible for about 10 seconds and at arms length i would need an 8 by 10 sheet of paper to cover it..all of my life i have experienced many strange things but for some reason this incident really scared the hell out of me.
